meanings.definition: A person who lives in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The habitant of the small village was known by everyone.
meanings.sent2: The habitant of the city enjoyed exploring new neighborhoods.
meanings.sent3: The habitant of the treehouse had the best view in the forest.
meanings.sent4: She was a habitant of the library, always surrounded by books.
meanings.sent5: The habitant of the island lived a peaceful and secluded life.

meanings.sent1: The habitant of the old mansion had many stories to tell.
meanings.sent2: The habitant of the apartment building greeted everyone with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The habitant of the haunted house was surprisingly cheerful.
meanings.sent4: He was a habitant of the bustling city, always on the move.
meanings.sent5: The habitant of the farm knew every animal by name.
